name: Atomic Rancher
description:
Atomic Rancher is a nuclear-fueled farming RPG that encourages players to grow, collect, and mutate their crops in order to survive.


Explore a vast and ruined world, brimming with mystery and adventure.

Experiment to grow better crops and create powerful mutants to help you in battle.

Build your settlement and defend it from dangerous mutants.

A world of opportunity awaits, will you thrive or only survive?



When life gives you lemons, mutate those lemons!
